parameters.name: AccessGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the permission group that is attached to the mount target.

parameters.name: DualStackMountTargetDomain
parameters.description:
The dual-stack (IPv4 and IPv6) domain name of the mount target.

>  Only Extreme NAS file systems that reside in the Chinese mainland support IPv6.

parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description:
The ID of the file system.

*   Sample ID of a General-purpose NAS file system: `31a8e4****`.
*   The IDs of Extreme NAS file systems must start with `extreme-`, for example, `extreme-0015****`.

parameters.name: MountTargetDomain
parameters.description: The IPv4 domain name of the mount target.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the mount target.

Valid values:

*   Active: The mount target is available.
*   Inactive: The mount target is unavailable.
